name: H.I.H.
description:
NOTE:
HIH is in the finalization process and the actual playable game has not been fully uploaded yet. This is a DEMO ITCH PAGE to be used only as a placeholder

PREMISE:

You have been sent to the worst of places to remind them of who is in charge. How long will you be able to last against the forces of darkness that close in upon you?

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

F - Light Attack

E - Heavy Attack

Q - Grab

R - Ranged Attack

SPACE - Dodge

THINGS TO DO:

Defend yourself in martial combat against incoming waves of enemies. Use all your skills to defeat as many enemies as you can. Different kinds of enemies require a different approach, so make sure you understand your entire arsenal in order to maximize your lethality.
